resources.string:
This app is the starting point of our study. Together, we'll take a look at the apps running on your system and what they do. 

First, we'll list which apps are installed on your phone. 
Next, we'll upload them so you can take a look at them on your desktop computer.
Here are all the apps on your phone.\nThey\'re listed here by their \"package names\": short, unique labels.
We\'ll upload just the names of these apps, nothing more. \nIf you want us to skip a particular app, just remove its name above.
You\'re all set now, thank you! Please continue to the next portion of the study.\n\nIf asked, please provide the following key:
